Infiltration Officer: This about you did speak Lakcis? They call me Terion, I help to you. I will describe, how to traverse the labyrinth of Belis. You will as soon as open this door, the enemies will attack on you. For the beginning it is necessary to kill their all and to pass beside the following room. Are you ready?
